name: Combat Tournament Godot
description:
A stickfigure arena brawler. Fight your way through these competitors 

Controls are ingame. Gamepad Support. 

player1 controls

wasd = move

h = attack

j = special

k = block

u = grab

enter = pause

Fullscreen is in options!

Credits : 

Everything is done by me execpt for the creation of double slap bat and music 

Creation of double slap bat : Anyoja

Music : by Nate and Xeno
